Sublime York thrash Lancaster in mixed badminton

York dismantled Lancaster in the Badminton mixed doubles 8-1 to take home the Roses points, with Dani Farsiani and Andy Henderson among the White Rose stars

Lancaster see off spirited York in Roses darts

The Roses ladies' darts contest saw the clashing of two hugely enthusiastic teams as York lost 7-2

James get Fyled away in Roses clash

York's sublime comeback in the third quarter was well quelled by the visitors as they came out as 26-32 victors

UYAFC outmuscled by gritty Lancaster

UYAFC fell 1-0 to a physical Lancaster side on the final day of Roses as they failed to avenge last year's defeat

York reign supreme in glorious weekend

It was truly a weekend to remember. We were treated to a Roses victory of crushing magnitude, providing the perfect end to an already brilliant year in the world of York Sport

Lacrosse women batter Lancaster opponents

The women's lacrosse team completed Roses' biggest thrashing of the tournament as they brushed past an almost non-existent opposition in the form of Lancaster

Heroic firsts snatch epic women's volleyball win

The York women's volleyball firsts claimed an extraordinary five set win over Lancaster on day three of Roses 2013 after saving four match points

York women's basketballers crushed by Lancaster

Despite battling hard, York's women basketballers were outclassed by a higher quality opponent in the Sports Hall. In every aspect of play, Lancaster bettered the White Rose

Men's football seconds narrowly lose out to 10-man Lancaster

Despite battling hard, York's football seconds were unable to find the scintillating form they showcased throughout most of this year, ultimately losing out to two headed Lancaster goals

Men's badminton firsts inspired in Roses win

The ever-reliable men's firsts badminton squad effortlessly carried on their gallant form shown all year as they claimed four easy points for the White Rose

Men's lacrosse dominate Lancaster

York's men dominated this match in a highly charged affair on the 22 acres. A superb team performance saw them secure victory against their red rose rivals

Men's football thirds in disappointing defeat

The men's thirds could count themselves a touch unlucky to lose 3-0 to Lancaster on an occasion where superior finishing and luck counted towards the Red Rose victory

York crash out in debut mixed seconds match

The volleyball mixed seconds team were frightfully unlucky as they lost in three straight sets in Roses' first ever fixture of this kind

Croquet bragging rights go to York team

The York contingent of YUSU President Kallum Taylor, Vice-Chancellor Brian Cantor and Chancellor Greg Dyke demolished their Lancastrian counterparts on Sunday in a highly charged affair outside Heslington Hall

York's hockey women capture Roses points in professional style

A composed and classy performance from York's women hockey firsts saw them gather four Roses points in fine style

Five set brawl in mixed volleyball leads to White Rose heartbreak

Both teams were pushed to the limits, with neither the White nor Red Rose deserving to lose this contest

Indoor hockey thriller sees men's firsts victorious

York's men's firsts indoor hockey squad produced one of the most entertaining and high-octane matches of Friday's fixtures in the Tent as they side edged out a narrow score-line of 6-5

Water polo men take points in Roses battle

The men's water polo team capped off an excellent day for UYSWC, beating Lancaster 8-4 in their Saturday night showpiece clash

Women's water polo in stunning Roses win

The women's water polo side romped to a superb 9-3 Roses victory on Saturday night

Gritty women's rugby beat Lancaster in injury-stricken contest

The women's rugby team avenged the defeats over the past two years to Lancaster to pull off a spirited 15-5 win despite the disruption of multiple injuries to both sides

Rugby firsts star in stadium rout

UYRUFC put in a sensational display of attacking rugby to slaughter a lamentable Lancaster side 57-14 in front of a packed audience at Huntington Stadium on Friday night

Lancaster seconds snatch draw in electric men's indoor hockey encounter

In a match of great intensity, Lancaster seconds snatched a 5-5 draw against York in the men's indoor hockey in front of a delirious crowd to share the Roses points

Outdoor Ultimate cruise to victory to secure Roses points

York's Ultimate Frisbee outdoors team ran out comprehensive 15-7 winners in style against Lancaster on day two of Roses 2013

Lancaster dominate women's rugby sevens firsts to take Roses points

The women's firsts suffered a comprehensive 35-5 defeat at the hands of a brutal Lancaster side on Friday in the final rugby sevens match of the tournament

Women's fencers stroll to comprehensive Roses win

The York women's fencing team sauntered to an easy 135-61 win over a lamentable Lancaster side on day two of Roses 2013 to secure four valuable points for the White Rose

Brave women's seconds fall to Lancaster in rugby sevens

The women's second team put in a performance full of spirit and passion as they fell 19-5 to a strong Lancaster side in the opening rugby fixture of Roses 2013

Immense Hilliam comeback clinches epic darts win

Kris Hilliam rallied from the precipice of defeat to clinch an emphatic 5-4 win for York in the Roses 2013 darts fixture on Saturday night

Emphatic York reclaim Roses trophy

York seized back the Roses trophy this weekend in style after completing a comprehensive 180.5 to 105.5 mauling of Lancaster

Passion, pride, and megaphones

By James Bithell

I was told by one particular fan on the sidelines that you never forget your first Roses. I think they were right

York edge netball barbarians clash

The highly anticipated college mix game saw the best of York pitted up against Lancaster, and they certainly didn't disappoint with a very strong performance
